description:
Select your character and join the fight!

Over 21 SAO characters, each with their own unique skills, gather on the battlefield to challenge fierce raid bosses! Team up with up to 20 players around the world for the ultimate co-op SAO all-stars battle experience!

The beta servers will be open during the following times:
9/20 (Fri) 7:00 PM PDT - 9/21 (Sat) 6:59 PM PDT
9/21 (Sat) 11:00 PM PDT - 9/22 (Sun) 7:59 PM PDT

Choose between two modes to try in the SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream Open Network Test

• Boss Raid
Online exclusive mode where you join in as a part of a raid team consisting of 20 members! How you prepare for the fight is the key to victory against the high difficulty raid boss!

• Co-op Quest
Online exclusive mode where you join in as a part of a 20 person team! Go clear separate maps, and join in the fight against the boss at the end!

Playable Characters included in the Open Network test:
Kirito
Asuna
Agil
Argo
Sinon
Oberon
Leafa
Llenn
Fukaziroh

*Player data from the network test version can be transferred to the product version. Please note that if the save data is deleted, it cannot be transferred.
